article_title: “Menopause the Musical: The Survivor Tour” comes to Harrisburg
article_text:
Please enable Javascript to watch this video

HARRISBURG, Pa. -- It's a humorous celebration of women and the change. "Menopause the Musical: The Survivor Tour" now playing at the Whitaker Center Sunoco Performance Theater in Harrisburg. "The Survivor Tour" benefits Susan G. Komen. Cast members Teri Adams and Megan Cavanagh stopped by Fox43 to talk about the production.

For ticket information: whitakercenter.org or call 717-214-ARTS.
